scripts.pack: npm run rebuild && .\node_modules\.bin\browserify.cmd dist/test.js > dist/bundle.js && del -f -q ".\dist\test.js"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run rebuild && npm run restore && npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run start -- -v build --pattern="/**/*.ts" --out-dir="./../dist" --root-dir="%cd%\src"
scripts.clean: (if exist node_modules rmdir node_modules /q /s) && (if exist dist rmdir dist /q /s) && (if exist package-lock.json del -f -q package-lock.json)
